short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrowserLlama is a browser extension that lets you summarize and chat with any webpage using a locally running Language model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
-Webpage Summaries: Create customizable summaries of any webpage .
 -Ask Questions about the webpage: Engage with webpage content by asking questions to the ai.
-AI Chat: Have conversations with language models.
-Locally running AI : Leverage your locally running language models for a fully private experience, ensuring your data never leaves your device.

browserllama is fully open-source: https://github.com/NachiketGadekar1/browserllama
